title: Update company address and contact phone number

requirements.text: Update the backend company information returned by `getCompanyInfo()` so that the address is "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India" and the phone number is "+91 8879802001" (ensuring the UI receives these values).

quotes:
i want to change the address to Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India
and contact number to +91 8879802001

acceptanceCriteria: Calling `getCompanyInfo()` returns a `CompanyInfo` record whose `address` is exactly "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India".
Calling `getCompanyInfo()` returns a `CompanyInfo` record whose `phone` is exactly "+91 8879802001".

requirements.text: Update the Contact section UI to display the new address and phone number as the fallback values when `companyInfo` is unavailable (e.g., query fails or `companyInfo` is null).

quotes:
i want to change the address to Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India
and contact number to +91 8879802001

acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact page, if `companyInfo?.address` is not available, the displayed address fallback is exactly "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India".
On the Contact page, if `companyInfo?.phone` is not available, the displayed phone fallback is exactly "+91 8879802001".

constraints: Do not modify any frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Keep all Motoko backend logic within the single actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if an upgrade/state migration is required.
nonGoals: Do not add a new admin UI or settings page to edit company info.
Do not implement third-party authentication or external database/storage integrations.
Do not change email, business hours, mission/history/capabilities text unless necessary to support the address/phone update.
